name: OTHERS
description:
Others is a first person exploration game set in a falling cycle of red and darkness.

Others is based on the Cartridge design OTHERS by Carl Gonzaga for My Famicase Exhibition 2018 at METEOR in Tokyo. Made for the #AGBIC Jam and #LOWREZJAM

Music by - dreamreader caves

Controls  Keyboard/Controller standard

WASD / Left Joystick - Move 

Mouse/  Right Joystick - Look

// MAC Version will be added soon
